overview: Tom Cadwell has over 30 years of silicon/semiconductor experience. Most recently as President and CEO of Integrated Materials Inc. (IMI) a silicon science and technology company, a board member of Solaicx, manufacturers of silicon ingots for photovoltaic applications, and a board member of Â Evergreen Solar. Previous to that Tom was President of MEMC Asia - a $450 million/year unit of MEMC, President and CEO of Strasbaugh, and President and CEO of Tecstar, Inc. Tom holds a BS Engineering degree from the University of Missouri and an MBA from Saint Louis University.
